data_properties.number_of_points_comment: FIXED! - 40 points w/ epsilon 0.3 causes weird PubKey bug
data_properties.range_lim_comment: for python, defines the range of the points (from BOTTOM_LIM to RANGE_LIM)
data_properties.conversion_factor_comment: for conversion from double-type to long-type (helib compatibility)
data_properties.bitSize_comment: 0 - 2^bitSize is the range of the numbers for encryption. if bigger the result will be the original number modulo the range
data_properties.TODO: change bit size to 10, if floats will be represented as longs (helib might have a new option for floats

helib_flags.helib_bootstrap_comment: better make it true if you want public_key to be "bootstrappeble", which you do (for cmp operation w/ min&max)
